thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 16 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Vertice 360 Covers 95.53 Pct Of Capital Increase In Preferential Offer Period

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Vertice 360 Covers 95.53 Pct Of Capital Increase In Preferential Offer Period
text:
Feb 16 (Reuters) - Vertice Trescientos Sesenta Grados SA (Vertice 360):
* SAID ON THURSDAY SHAREHOLDERS SIGNED UP FOR 95.53 PERCENT OF THE RIGHTS IN 3.5 MILLION EURO CAPITAL INCREASE DURING PREFERRED SUBSCRIPTION PERIOD
* SQUIRREL CAPITAL SUBSCRIBED TO AROUND 25.2414 PERCENT OF THE SHARES
* SECOND PART OF THE CAPITAL INCREASE IS CARRIED OUT IN A FORM OF CREDIT COMPENSATION
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
